title: Are you going to vote your home into a nuclear target? (British poster, 1983)
Text: Are you going to vote your home into a nuclear target? Or will you vote for a safer tomorrow? Think Positive. Act Positive. Vote Labour.
Additional information: Labour had committed to unilateral disarmament in its 1983 manifesto and published a great deal of material attacking the Conservativesâ€™ nuclear weapons policies ahead of the 1983 election, which the Conservatives ultimately won in a landslide.
